Title: Saige Paints the Sky
Writer: Jessica O'Toole (teleplay), Amy Rardin (teleplay), Jessica Haas (based on: The Saige Stories by)
Actors: Sidney Fullmer, Alexandra Peters, Alana Gordillo, Mika Abdalla
Plot: Meet nine-year old Saige, a talented artist with a passion for horses, in this modern-day story about finding your voice! Saige is excited about the new school year, until she discovers ...
